job.title: Big Data Engineer
job.description: pstrongBig Data EngineerstrongppbrppstrongAbout UsstrongppbrppAt Wevision we build services data platform AI and machine learningbased optimization engines tonbspnbspautomate the whole software development process Our tenet is to build a strong tech team to deliver E2E solutions covering tech areas ranging from research big data micro services to data applications with frontend toolsCome join our team at Wevision a fastgrowing startup dedicated to building AI and machine learningbased optimization engines to automate software development and implementationppbrppstrongResponsibilities strongppbrpulliDesign architect develop scale and improve our data platform and its servicesliliImplement largescale highthroughput solutions using onpremise and cloud technologies such as Kafka Spark on HadoopHiveS3 AWS Lambda Terraform Kubernetes etcnbspliliParticipate in novel solutions to challenging technical problems introduce new technologies to our data platform and its servicesnbspliliDiagnose and debug issues in development staging and production environmentsliliCollaborate with productprogram managers software developers and analysts in an open creative environmentliulpnbspppstrongBelow is the expected technical skills experiences etcstrongppbrpulliStrong programming ScalaJava and shell scripting skillsliliExperience with batch processing technologies like Apache SparkliliAbility to explore and analyze datasets using SQLliliExperience in Software Development Lifecycle and its activitiesnbspliulpbrppstrongSome NicetohavesstrongppbrpulliExperience with realtime processing technologies like Apache SparkFlinkliliExperience with andor knowledge of CICD pipelinesliulpbrppJob type Full time Contactp
